data.message: Aight but in the beginning it was good then good and evil then malchezeldeks promise to Abrahams faith in sercumstancial rates to a fight and issac almost getting sacrificed saying please God don't take my blessing because of those muslims in enemy territory, to Jacob going to Egypt gaining all the gold getting inslaved and freed, we saw the name I had as jesus die on the cross and lived, both bought over and both lived, and in the end kingdom to kingdom nations to nations and check a nation, ww1 ww2 Vietnam Korea Iraq then checking Syria no further details, I got told I was jesus and got arrested I opened a message to the nations in court and got dropped out the back of the chair said I struggled when I was half way koed and jumped me with 8 people charged I owed 200 billion dollars for the ocean, I wrote down farmers Shepards save the firstborn cow and make it reproduce at a second standard rate while holding standard and feed people and I know crops and townspeople can work around that and make products we work for good stuff right why can't we get more good stuff, open up jobs damn it, and freaking open up new jobs on the ocean and transportation being the newest ford rockifeller Einstein person named jesus since I got told with outter bodies flipping out so I read three days before I got arrested wrote down my final paper then Obama went on tv and announced it without me, so technically on an international nations scale I run the world I'm freed and should be retired
